data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zolotuhin, Vadim V. (2018): Nomenclature and synonymic remarks on two species of Eupterotidae (Lepidoptera) described by Johan Christian Fabricius, and notes on related species. Zootaxa 4471 (2): 381-386, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.2.11|3 occurrences
